title: Understanding Opioid Prescription Medications
text: Opioid prescription medications are often used to manage pain. They are derived from the opium poppy plant or synthesized in laboratories.

title: Common Opioid Medications
text: Some common opioid medications include morphine, oxycodone, and hydrocodone. These are often prescribed for moderate to severe pain.

hintAnswer: morphine, oxycodone, hydrocodone, fentanyl, and hydromorphone
title: Identifying Opioid Medications
text: Which of the following lists contains only opioid prescription medications?
choices: morphine, oxycodone, hydrocodone, fentanyl, and hydromorphone
